item.title: Seal
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 8.5”/ 21 cm when made with the indicated yarn. seal pattern MATERIALS: Sport weight yarn in gray, pink and black Size B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (13 mm) Yarn needle Pins Stitch markers Fiberfill for stuffing body (in gray yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Rnd 2: inc in all 6 st [12]
